Header: 2 (V) GR Troops Contribute to Coastal Belt Clean-Up
Content: Troops of 2 (Volunteer) Gajaba Regiment under the 221 Brigade of the 22 Division under the Security Force Headquarters â€“ East took part in a programme to clean up the coastal belt from Maniyaveli-Trincomalee on Sunday (15). The programme was conducted under the supervision of the Commanding Officer of the 2 (V) Gajaba Regiment.
